dialog_piece.speaker: Narrator
dialog_piece.text: In the year 2230, humanity finally reached for the stars. The vast universe was at our hand, and a new era of prosper begun, as we colonized new worlds.

dialog_piece.speaker: Narrator
dialog_piece.text: But we soon realized we were not alone. Other species from faraway planets reached the point of galactic exploration, and started competing with us, stopping us.

dialog_piece.speaker: Narrator
dialog_piece.text: In this scenario of conquest, a task force of rangers was assembled, to scout for new inhabitable planets.

dialog_piece.speaker: Narrator
dialog_piece.text: You are one of such spacenauts, ranger Jack Hawks, pilot of the Delta Fury spaceship.

dialog_piece.speaker: Narrator
dialog_piece.text: You just received a request to explore a newly found planet in quadrant alpha, named Zeta-4, and immediately depart for your mission.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Welcome to the training grounds Jack. Here we are going to tests your reflexes, as well as your spaceship's responsivity. Is everything ready?

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: All systems in check. I'm ready.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Good. Then let us begin.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Try moving around. Tap the screen and drag your finger. Your spaceship will move accordingly.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: You'll also notice that when you tap the screen, you will shoot in the same direction you pointed. Remember that.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: You'll see some training dummies just ahead. Their lasers are weak, but deadly nonetheless. Learn to dodge them.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: If you get hit your spaceship will incur in damage. See the green bar on the upper left? If it empties, it's Game Over.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Sometimes, your targets will drop an upgrade component for your ship when defeated.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Grab or shoot them, and you'll acquire a temporary power up.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: For example, the Trigun, will allow you to shoot three lasers at once for about 15 seconds.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Two barricades await you just ahead. You can't pass through them so you'll need to slip in between them.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: And here comes the fun. During you journey you will encounter enormous enemies, known as bosses.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: These enemies are much tougher than their minions. Some also have weird attack behaviors. A red bar on your radar will show the boss's health.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: And now, for your first test. Defeat Big Dummy!

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: This is HQ. Delta Fury do you read me?

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Here Delta Fury. All clear. I'm en route to Zeta-4. ETA 5 minutes.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Good. The route should be clear. Proceed.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Delta Fury here. I'm detecting unidentified spaceships ahead. They seem to be stationed on the path to Zeta-4.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: This is weird, the planet should be inhabited...

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Watch out! There are lasers coming at you!

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: I'm answering to enemy fire!

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Be careful Delta Fury, we just detected a warhead headed your way.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Our scanners indicate that it might contain smaller cruisers. Prepare yourself.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Delta Fury, we have new info about the aggressors.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: I'm listening.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: We've analized data from your previous encounter. Although we do not know much yet, they seem to be tied to Zeta-4.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: I thought the planet wasn't inhabited.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: So did we. Our scanners revealed no sign of sentient species populating the planet.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: We're investigating further and let you know as soon as we know more. Until then, go on with the mission.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Copy that. Jack out.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Good thing this was an uninhabited planet...

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: We never said anything about the local fauna.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: You call a 3 meters tall beast spitting fire "local fauna"?

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Well, watch out for the dragons.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: ...excuse me?

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Look out you're approaching a dangerous zone.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Why, would you call that canyon a "safe zone"?

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: No but it sure is safer than a dragon's nest.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: I should have expected something like that.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Delta Fury here. I found a passage deep within the jungle, nearby a ravine. It seems to lead to some sort of abandoned facility.

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: Thread carefully Delta Fury. We have reason to suspect that facility is tied with the unknown aggressors. We detect signs from their spaceships.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: So they were here all along? But why?

dialog_piece.speaker: Headquarters
dialog_piece.text: We do not yet know but they will sure have armed up their defenses. Watch your back.

dialog_piece.speaker: Jack
dialog_piece.text: Will do. Jack out.
